description:
Lux trail mix for the trails, the office, or anywhere you need a snack and feel like treating yourself. Roasted almonds, sweet craisins, and nutrient rich goji berries make this sweet and salty mix deliciously moreish.

  • Ingredients: almonds*, raisins* (raisins*, sunflower oil*), pumpkin seeds*, cashews*, cranberries* (cranberries*, cane sugar*, sunflower oil*), sunflower seeds*, goji berries*, tamari sauce* (water, soybeans*, salt). *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: Brazil nuts, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, walnut, sesame
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Annapurna Superfruit Mix
